CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK( Owner:User.ContactId ) , NULL, Distributor__r.BillingStreet &BR()& Distributor__r.BillingCity &BR()& Distributor__r.BillingState &BR()& Distributor__r.BillingPostalCode &BR()& Distributor__r.BillingCountry
)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is automaticilly populated when the distributor lookup is populated
CustomField.label: Distributor Address
